name: Arc-en-ciel Mystery
text:
1 Tuner + 2 non-Tuner "Arc-en-ciel" monsters
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can add 1 "Dream Prism" from your GY to your hand or equip it to this card. This card gains 500 ATK for each face-up "Dream Prism" you control. This card cannot be destroyed by card effects while it is equipped with "Dream Prism". You can send 1 "Dream Prism" you control to the GY: Add 1 "Arc-en-ciel" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only activate this effect of "Arc-en-ciel Mystery" once per turn.
